data.name: Offensive Combat: Redux!
data.detailed_description:
"Offensive Combat: Redux! is a fast-paced, frenetic online FPS game that lets you show your skill and play as a number of different unique characters including Commandos, Aliens, Geckos, Chickens, Orcs, Pirates, Disco Stars, Anonymous (yes, we hope they don't hack us), and more! Gear up with dozens of insane weapons and level up your guns, nades and character skins in single player mode. Test out new weapons in the Weapon Range, then explore the maps to get yourself ready for multiplayer.

Team up in Team Deathmatch and Capture the Flag, or jump into the chaos of a free-for-all round of Deathmatch. With 11 very different maps and multiple modes, Offensive Combat: Redux! is a unique, funny, FPS game that you won't want to miss!

Earn XP in Single-Player, or Multiplayer modes to unlock weapon upgrades, better melee weapons and fun grenades. Earn coins to spend on new avatar parts, or pwn your opponents for random loot drops of avatar parts.

And best of all, there are No Micro-Transactions! Yeah, we're not into that BullS**t!

Features

  • 11 Maps
  • Weapons, Weapons, Weapons - Assault Rifles, Sniper Rifles, SMGs, Shotguns, Handguns, Melee Weapons
  • Hundreds of Avatar Parts - Show your unique character as you chose from more than 40 character heads, chests, legs, arms and feet and more than 1,000 combinations at launch
  • Power-ups – find time-limited power-ups in game including Chainguns, Armor, Double Damage, Rocket Launchers, and more
  • Multiple Pwns- Teabag your enemies after you kill them for extra rewards and random drops
  • Multiplayer Game Modes
    -Deathmatch (2-16 Players)
    -Team Deathmatch (2-16 Players)
    -Capture the Flag (4-16 Players)
  • Single Player Modes - Earn XP and Coins to upgrade your weapons and buy new skins
    -Anihilator - Fight 1 against everyone
    -Wave Defense - It's you against hundreds of enemies in a King of the Hill Tower Defense mode
    -Map Exploration Mode
    -Weapon Range

Map List

-Disasteroids - Space is dangerous, especially in this abandoned mining colony filled with crashing asteroids and platforms that fling you across the map
-Painhouse - Welcome to Painhouse, where multiple low-rise buildings still under construction set the stage for snipers and run-and-gun battles
-Triggermortis - There's nothing like playing King of the Hill in a graveyard...get to the top!
-Last Resort - A beautiful beach location that has clearly gone horribly wrong as the OC legion has come to play
-Shortest Yard - The shipping containers hide a secret, but everyone is more focused on staying alive in this tight close quarters battle map
-Burninator - A lava filled citadel in ruins. Grab some armor and get to the top of the map for the best vantage point
-Courtyard - An Asian temple with Dragon Statues and Koi ponds that keeps you moving
-Dry Run - A desert themed town that features plenty of sniping spots and three paths that make this a favorite for Capture-The-Flag games
-Probetown - The Aliens have landed in suburbia and they're beaming you up to pick up power-ups like armor and the Chaingun!!
-Slums - A run down section of a city that features sniping spots and close quarters choke points as well as all of the power-ups and ammo crates
-Turbine - A futuristic energy plant with multiple towers and lots of places to battle it out"

data.short_description: Offensive Combat: Redux! is a fast, frenetic, take-no-prisoners, online FPS game. Play single player to earn XP and Coins to level up your gear, then jump into multiplayer Deathmatch, or Team Deathmatch and Capture The Flag with up to 15 other players across 11 very different maps.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Un juego colorido, divertido, bastante simple pero rico en opciones de personalización. Buen pasatiempo y con mucho sentido del humor.”
IGN

“If you’re looking for an FPS that doesn’t have a bunch of L33T players trying to get the highest level possible, this will be right up your alley.”
9. – Bleeding Cool

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: Intel Core i5-2500k or AMD Phenom II X4 955
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 570 or Radeon HD 6850
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 4 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Процессор: Intel Core i5-7400 or AMD Athlon X4 845
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Geforce GTX 1050 or Radeon RX 570 or higher
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 4 GB
